meanings.definition: To lightly touch or tap with the hand or a flat object.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys patting her dog on the head.
meanings.sent2: The baby was patting the table with his tiny hands.
meanings.sent3: The cat was patting the water in the bowl, trying to catch the reflection.
meanings.sent4: The raindrops were patting the window softly, creating a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: He was patting the dough gently to shape it into a perfect circle.

meanings.definition: The act of lightly touching or tapping with the hand or a flat object.
meanings.sent1: I could hear the gentle patting of rain on the roof.
meanings.sent2: The rhythmic patting of the drummer's hands added to the music.
meanings.sent3: The patting of the audience's feet on the floor created a unique beat.
meanings.sent4: The constant patting of the waves against the shore was calming.
meanings.sent5: The patting of the chef's hands on the dough signaled the start of baking.
